metadata.title: Thursday, 14th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development when the following Health Centres in Kasempa Parliamentary Constituency will be electrified
Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development when schools and clinics along the Nakatindi Road and the Zambezi West Bank in Sesheke will be connected to the national electricity grid.
Minister of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection when land surveyors will be sent to Mitete District to prepare the area for development.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure) : Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 14/01: under consideration): (Mr Mbulakulima). Heads 14/02, 14/03, 14/04, 14/05, 14/06, 14/07, 85/01, 85/02, 85/03, 85/04, 85/07, 85/08, 85/09, 85/10, 68/01, 68/02, 68/03, 68/04, 34/01, 26/01, 26/02, 26/03, 26/04, 31/01, 31/02, 31/03 and 31/08 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 14    -    Ministry of Mines, Energy and Water Development Head 85    -    Ministry of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection Head 68    -    Ministry of Tourism and Art Head 34    -    Human Rights Commission Head 26    -    Ministry of Information and Broadcasting Head 31    -    Ministry of Justice
